name: Hostess with the Mostess Sewing Pattern - PDF pattern - Instant Download
description:
Create this couture hostess apron and make a statement at your next party or create a unique gift for a party host!

Fabrics used can include cottons, suedes, silk, tulle, organza.... the list goes on. The design possibilities are endless and exciting! Visit the handmade goods category for inspiration and ideas.

Fabric and Supplies needed:

Fabric:

Lining = 5/8 yd. (36” wide fabric)
Apron Front = 5/8 yd. (44” wide, fabric) 
Ties = 1/2 yd (44” wide fabric)
Top Ruffle = 1/8 yd (44” wide fabric)
Middle Ruffle = 1/8 yd *(44” wide fabric)
Bottom Ruffle = 1/4 yd (44” wide fabric)
Waistband= 6” x 25” pc. fabric

* Any trim, lace or roll of tulle with a approximate width of 4” - 5” and 44” long can be used for the middle ruffle.

Supplies:

Sewing Machine and General Sewing Kit
Yard Stick
Transfer Paper
Iron
Decorative Embellishment (such as a button, pin, or a fabric flower)
Serger (Optional)
Gathering Foot Attachment (Optional)

This pattern is best suitable for the intermediate sewist. The 22 page PDF file consists of detailed Instructions with professional illustrations and includes 15 pages of pattern sheets to be assembled. No actually product will be shipped. This listing is for a PDF instant download only.

name: The Caftan Cover-Up - PDF pattern - Instant Download
description:
The Caftan Cover-up allows for a loose and flowing look but still gives you a shapely silhouette with cape sleeves extending to draped sides. 
It's the perfect cover-up to enjoy afternoon drinks poolside, or wear a slip under this sheer style for a night on the town! 

Pattern sizes include womens-	   XS (2-4)
					           S (4-6)
					           M (6-8)
					           L (8-10)
					          XL (10-12)

Materials and Supplies needed:

2 yds (xs, s) - 2 ¼ yds (m, l, xl) lightweight or sheer fabric 
24” x 15” one-sided, light weight, fusible interfacing
sewing machine and basic sewing kit
iron
disappearing tailor's chalk

The pattern for the Caftan Cover-Up will  22- 8 ½” x 11 letter size pages to be printed

Step by step instructions with photos and professionally illustrated diagrams will guide you through creating your Caftan with ease. 
Best suited for a Beginner/Intermediate Seamstress.

name: c'est la mode Collar and Cuffs - PDF Pattern  -Instant Download
description:
French Inspired, Elegant, Unique Detachable Collar and Cuffs.
Dress up any simple shirt instantly with these! Can be made from various medium weight fabrics to create the look you desire. 

Pattern consist of easy to follow instructions, detailed photos and 4 printable pattern pages.  All Posh Girl Friday PDF sewing patterns are created with a grid background making it easy to assembly the pattern pages with perfect alignment. 

Material and Supplies needed:
3/8 yd. of fabric
3/8 yd. of lining
3/8 yd. of one-sided fusible interfacing
3-5 small snaps
4 buttons
1  light weight necklace charm
1 yd. of .5” to 1” wide lace or lace seam binding
Sewing Machine and Basic Sewing Kit
Iron

c'est la mode Collar and Cuffs are sure to make a fashionable statement in the workplace or a night out on the town.

name: 60's Ring Scarf with Rosette Pattern - PDF pattern - Instant Download
description:
Listing is for a 60's Ring Scarf with Rosette Pattern- PDF Instant Download!

This fashionable scarf slips directly over your head and
can be made to wear with jeans or a night at the opera.
Not only fashionable, this scarf also adds warmth and comfort.
A fashion must have!

Fabric and Supplies needed:

Fabric:

One Yard of cotton, silk, polyester, or organza. Choose a fabric which is not irritating to the skin.

***GO GREEN idea***
(second photo) Scrap fabric pieces were sewn together to create
a yard of fabric.

Supplies:

Sewing Machine and General Sewing Kit
Chalk pencil or fabric marker
Turning tool
Iron
Decorative embellishment(s), such as a button,
beads, or pin.
Fabric Glue

Pattern is perfect and fun for the beginner! 4 pages of professionally drawn diagrams and easy to follow instructions. Pattern is 10 pages and includes printing and assembly instructions. Get inspired by Posh Girl Fridays "Your Scarf, Your Style" photos and ideas!

This listing is for a PDF - Instant Download. File download will be sent to your paypal E-mail address immediately after purchase. 

Questions? E-mail us at contact@poshgirlfriday.com.

name: Paris Couture 1901 digital image - Vintage Fashion Image - 1800 - 1900 ephemera
description:
Paris Couture 1901 digital image for instant download! I created this image by manipulating a 1901 Lyon umbrella ad along with a sign I edited from a 1891 Ladies Home Journal article discussing "Costumes for Maids and Matrons".

This item is a digital art that you can print at home. Great for  T-shirts, pillows, quilts, mixed media art, iron-on transfers, framing, wall decorations, card making, jewelry holders, scrapbooking, etc. Use your graphic software, print it and use your paintbrush, add embellishments or leave it as is....possibilities are endless.

Page size - 8.5 x 11 inch.

Download is for one image (without watermark) at 300 dpi, 8.5 x 11 inch JPG file with a white background. 

Please note that what you see here is a low resolution copy, the actual image you'll get will be the high resolution 300 dpi file without the watermark.

Terms of use:
* For personal use only. Do not redistribute files or sell the prints.
* However, any original handmade artwork or finished product created with the images may be commercially sold. (ex: your physical creations - handmade jewelry, pillows, T-shirts, quilts, etc.)

NOTE: This is a digital product, no physical product will be sent.

Create your own masterpiece!

If you have a question or a request for a custom order, please contact me and I'll be happy to help. Thanks for shopping Posh Girl Friday!

name: The Masquerade Ball Party Printable Set
description:
The Masquerade Ball Party Printable Set includes everything you need to host an affair to remember! 

The party theme was designed around a Vintage Music Sheet Cover, circa 1907, that shows a remarkable Masquerade Ball!! Where do I begin?? This fabulous cover features a beautiful young Couple wearing their Masks and Costumes, a fabulous pink and blue Clown, among all the other fancy party goers! Surrounding all this fabulousness are Theater Masks, Peacock Feathers, and Musical Instruments. The welcome sign and Invites created with this image are enough to set the tone for your party alone! Great for Mardi Gras or any masquerade theme celebration! 

This kit is waiting to be instantly downloaded, printed and used! You can use Adobe Reader to fill the areas needed. They are highlighted in blue. You can not change the font or size, however, we select coordinating fonts with our themes that look marvellous!

Printable Party Kit includes:
8.5 x 11 inch Welcome Sign
4.25 x 5.5 inch Invitations (4 per page)
Party Bag Template 
1.5 inch Cupcake Toppers (4 designs - 12 per page)
Thank You Tags (2 Designs - 12 per page)
Food Tent Cards (2 Designs - 2 per page)
Straw Flags (2 Designs - 12 per page)
Wine Glass Tags (3 Designs - 6 per page)
Favor Bag Toppers ( 2 Designs - 2 per page)
Cupcake Wrappers ( 3 Designs - 3 per page)
3 Banner Flag Designs ( 1 per page)
PLUS: 3- 8.5 x 11 inch coordinating pattern papers
and a BONUS Mask Template for you or your party guests to decorate!

Because my party packages leave a lot of room for my customers to customise the printables themselves, please feel free to E-mail photos of your creations to contact@poshgirlfriday.com. I LOVE seeing all the different ideas that you come up with! 

Remember: This is a PDF file download for you to print and customise yourself. No actual products will be shipped to you. 

You can print these files as many times as you wish but please do not share this file or resell any of it's contents via download or printed.

Adobe Reader is required to customise and print the PDF files,  which is a free download at adobe.com.

Will be in available March 2013!
xoxo Tracey

name: English Garden in Check Hostess Apron
description:
Exquisite apron made with top quality fabrics. Apron front is a heavy cotton printed with vibrant colors and stunning floral designs. Ruffles include high quality linen, lightweight gold fabric, and a embroidered floral sheer. The floral embroider on the sheer is absolutely beautiful! This was the only piece I had in my stash and was one of my favorites. Waistband is in a embossed faux golden brown leather. Ties are extra long, in an heavy, antique white linen. Embellished with a handmade antique white linen floral pin. Floral center was created from a gold tone vintage ear ring. Pin embellishment is removable.


One of a Kind
Handmade
Fits Most
Spot Clean Only

Design by: Tracey Gianakas of Posh Girl Friday
Tailored by: Marcella Galina of Posh Girl Friday
Pattern used: Posh Girl Friday - Hostess with the Mostest Apron

name: Couture Check Hostess Apron
description:
Couture check hostess apron made with top quality fabrics. A black, grey and vintage white, buffalo check, lightweight fabric front. Ruffles include a lightweight grey fabric and delicate vintage lace,  overlaying a sheer silk and cotton blend fabric in dramatic black. Waistband is gunmetal grey. Ties are extra long. Embellished with a 1970's ear ring of gold outlined sheer fabric flowers, jewels, and hanging beads. 

One of a Kind.

Handmade.

Fits Most.

Design by: Tracey Gianakas
Tailored by: Italian seamstress Marcella Galina
Pattern used: Posh Girl Friday - Hostess with the Mostest Apron
Made in: USA

name: Are you ready to party? Hostess Apron
description:
Oh yeah...zebra print, pretty polka dots, vintage lace, and a pinstripes! Who knows what this party will have in store??!! So 80's. It makes you want to sing that song by C & C music factory..."You all want this party started? Right? You all want this party started ... quickly! Right? :)

A party host must have! Zebra ties are extra long. Flower is detachable.

Handmade
Fits Most
Spot Clean Only

Design by: Tracey Gianakas
Tailored by: Italian seamstress Marcella Galina
Pattern used: Posh Girl Friday - Hostess with the Mostest Apron
Made in: USA

name: The Heather Hostess Apron
description:
If you LOVE Heather Bailey the way I do....this apron is a must have! Heather Bailey's fabric is used throughout, with the only exception of the pink ruffle. Her fabric is high quality cotton and printed in the most vibrant colors. I had to have one of my Hostess with the Mostest patterns completed in her fabric designs. The apron is embellished with a removable pin. 100% cotton. Extra long ties.

One of a Kind.

Handmade.

Fits Most.

Design by: Tracey Gianakas
Tailored by: Italian seamstress Marcella Galina
Pattern used: Posh Girl Friday - Hostess with the Mostest Apron
Made in: USA

name: Green with Envy and Lace Hostess Apron
description:
Nothing says "Look Who's the Hostess with the Mostest", like this Apron! A must have for a lover of couture! All fabrics used are stunning and the vintage faux pearls are a bonus!

Fabrics include; Green Taffeta with stitched floral, deep burgundy sheers with a vibrant floral pattern, and heavy vintage scalloped lace that has been re-purposed from table wear. Micro suede waistband in vintage white. Rosette embellishment was created using heavy lace and has a cluster of vintage faux pearls in the center. Embellishment is pinned on and is removable. Ties are extra long. Make a statement and ENJOY!

One of a Kind
Handmade
Fits Most
Spot Clean Only

Design by: Tracey Gianakas
Tailored by: Italian seamstress Marcella Galina
Pattern used: Posh Girl Friday - Hostess with the Mostest Apron
Made in: USA

name: Bright colored fall 60's ring scarf
description:
This bright colored 60's ring scarf is perfect for fall! It's lightweight, soft and comfortable to wear. Burgundy background surrounds orange, white, purple and green floral prints. A few large paisleys can be spotted as well. Adorn with a pin or wear it naturally draped.

Handmade from Posh Girl Fridays 60's Ring Scarf pattern.

100% soft Poly

measures 10 inches by 26 inches
